pages.text: 97|1|nihsandeh, hamane us (quraan) ko lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) mein utaara.
97|2|aur tum kya jaano ki vah lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) kya hai
97|3|lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) hazaar maas se uttam hai.
97|4|usamen (har kaam ko poorn karane ke lie) farishte tatha roohî€¼ (jibreel) apane paalanahaar kee aagya se utarate hain.
97|5|vah shaanti kee raatri hai, jo bhor hone tak rahatee hai.
98|1|ahle kitaab ke kaafir aur mushrik log eemaan laane vaale nahin the jab tak ki unake paas khula pramaam na aa jaaye.
98|2|arthaat allaah ka ek rasool, jo pavitr granth padhakar sunaaye.
98|4|aur jin logon ko granth diye gaye, unhonne is khule pramaan ke aa jaane ke pashchaat hee matabhed kiya.
98|5|aur unhen keval yahee aadesh diya gaya tha ki ve dharm ko shudhd rakhen aur sabako taj kar keval allaah kee upaasana karen, namaaz ada karen aur zakaat den aur yahee shaasht dharm hai.
98|6|nihsandeh, jo log ahle kitaab mein se kaafir ho gaye tatha mushrik (mishranavaadee), to ve sada narak kee aag mein rahenge aur vahee dushtatam jan hain.
98|7|jo log eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar karate rahe, to vahee sarvashreshth jan hain.
